entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:15 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Rapids 9:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
